page.title: 03LIFE STYLES GOLDSBORO'AREA
page.content: People are interested in {health}and {beauty.}They are trying to eat food that is good for them.{Fibre,skimmed {milk,fresh fruit}and{vegetables}are supposed to be good:{animal fat,sugar and{processed food}are supposed to be harmful. People like to look{brown.}So we{sun {bathe}and use{sun lamps,}but some{ {doctors}believe that this is not good for us.{ { Slimming,Keep fit}and{Health clubs} are popular. Young people often wear clothes similar to the pop groups who record music which is frequently played on radio.At present pop music is loud. One of the most popular pop groups is{ {DURAN DURAN.}Some people wear their hair spiky,most women wear make-up and a few men do!!!!
